stages.logText: I traded 5 of my 'mermaid coins' to Gylew for 500 gold.
I foolishly gave 5 of my 'mermaid coins' to Gylew.
I have agreed to set off to Laeroth Manor in pursuit of the Korhald coins and to bring them back to Gylew.
I sold the 10 coins that I looted from the Arulir secret room to Gylew.
I gave Gylew the 10 coins that I looted from the Arulir secret room.
In the Laeroth basement, I noticed a sign on the wall that i could not read in its entirety, but I was able make out the name 'Korhald'. This makes me wonder if this is a clue?
In the Laeroth basement, I discovered and looted the chest containing the 'Korhald coins'.
In the Laeroth basement, I encountered an injured man named Forenza.
I aided Forenza with an ointment for bleeding wounds.
In the Laeroth basement, I was able to help out Forenza by giving him a bonemeal potion.
In the Laeroth basement, I was able to help out Forenza by giving him a major health potion.
In the Laeroth basement, I was able to help out Forenza by giving him a potion of health from Lodar.
In the Laeroth basement, I was able to help out Forenza by giving him a regular health potion.
In the Laeroth basement, I was able to help out Forenza by giving him a minor health potion.

I've decided to help Forenza by agreeing to get the second key from Gylew. I should go back to Gylew now. Forenza has left the Manor island and has asked that I meet him outside of Brimhaven after my "business" with Gylew is complete.
I have decided to attack Forenza. I should return to Gylew with the key once he is dead.
We discovered a mysterious map inside the Korhald chest and I need to follow the river going east.
I have decided to attack Gylew. I should return to Forenza with the key once he is dead.
I killed Gylew and should return to Forenza with Gylew's key.
Inside the Korhald cave, I found the Coin of Prestige and the Shield of the Brave. I should return to Forenza and show him the coin.
Inside the Korhald cave, I found the Coin of Prestige and the Shield of the Brave. I should return to Gylew and show him the coin.
I sold Gylew the Coin of Prestige and he rewarded me handsomely for it.
I gave Gylew the Coin of Prestige and he told me that if I ever make my way to Feygrad, to seek out his family and they will 'make that shield a little bit better". Whatever that means.
I sold Forenza the Coin of Prestige and he rewarded me handsomely for it.
I gave Forenza the Coin of Prestige and he told me that if I ever make my way to Brightport, to seek out his family and they will 'reward" me. Whatever that means.
